question: Who has been bestowed with the prestigious P C Chandra Puraskaar 2017?
explanation: Nobel Laureate Kailash Satyarthi has been bestowed with the prestigious P C Chandra Puraskaar 2017 for his global crusade against child slavery and exploitative by the PC Chandra Jewellers on April 23, 2017 at the Science City auditorium in Kolkata, West Bengal.  This year the P C Chandra Puraskaar carries an honorarium of Rs 10 lakh, which is tax exempted.
